text:
Klaus F. Obermeyer (born December 2, 1919) is a German-born American businessman. He is the founder of Sport Obermeyer, Ltd. Obermeyer was born in Oberstaufen, Germany. He was added into the U.S. National Ski and Snowboard Hall of Fame in 1997.
He created the first nylon windshirt. He also created the first mirrored ski sunglasses from vaporized metal.
Obermeyer turned 100 in December 2019.
